column3: ber a Asiriahen Sargon somaa no
column4: na ɔnye Ashdod bɔkoe na ɔfae no;"

column2: "ber no mu nna EWURADZE nam Amoz ba Isaia do kaa dɛ
column4: kɛpa eyitam no fi w'asen mu
column5: na san mpaboa no fi w'anan. Na ɔyɛɛ dɛm dze adagyaw nye anamɔnkwaa nantsewee."

column3: Dɛ mbrɛ m'akowaa Isaia nam adagyaw nye anamɔnkwaa mfe ebiasa ma ɔaayɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ɔnye anwanwadze ama Egypt na Etiopia yi;"

column2: "dɛmara na Asiriahen bɛka Egyptfo ndɔmmumfo na Etiopiafo amantufo akɔ
column4: adagyaw mu na anamɔnkwaafo a hɔn etun deda hɔ

column2: "Na hɔn bo botu na hɔn enyi ato
"Na nsuano kuromnyi no bɛka wɔ da no mu dɛ
column4: mbrɛ hɛn enyidado a yeguanee kɔdɔɔ hɔ dɛ wɔnkɛgye hɛn mfi Asiriahen nsamu tse nye yi: na hɛn dze
